# Sebastian Selinger

> System Administrator at the University of Freiburg, Owner of Selinger Consulting (IT Consulting), and QA Expert in the Gaming Industry with focus on AR/VR.

## About

Sebastian Selinger is a professional based in Freiburg, Germany, with three main professional pillars:

1. **System Administrator** at the University of Freiburg - IT infrastructure, server management, networking, and virtualization
2. **IT Consultant** as owner of Selinger Consulting - strategic IT consulting for businesses
3. **QA Expert** in the gaming industry - quality assurance for AAA games, AR/VR applications (HoloLens, Oculus), and security research

- XING: https://www.xing.com/profile/Sebastian_Selinger
- Contact form: https://sebastianselinger.de/#contact

## Services

- IT Consulting & Advisory
- System Administration & Infrastructure
- QA & Testing (Gaming, AR/VR)

## Key Collaborations

Microsoft, Ubisoft, Netflix, Keywords Studios, HashiCorp, Amazon Prime Video, Realworld One, XboxDev
